item.description:
I'd like to get togther with others who enjoy knitting. New knitters,those with some experience and experts, come join in the fun. Let's learn and share together.

I started knitting several years ago, then stopped for a long time, and over the past couple of years have begun again. But I have yet to master socks, and would love some input from others!

Come for coffee, conversation and sharing....
item.name: The Newington Knitting November Meetup
